items.sentence: Tom showed up at the party with his new girlfriend.
Tom slept in the backseat of the car as Mary drove.
Tom spends time with his grandparents every Monday.
Tom said he didn't think we should call the police.
Tom said he had something important to do and left.
Tom said he was absolutely sure Mary would do that.
I told Tom he should save a little money each week.
Tom could feel the air whipping his face as he ran.
Tom took care of John's cat while he was in prison.
I consider Tom a thoroughly responsible individual.
